channel.title: Re/Fragmented Remix Contest
channel.description:
Hello everyone. Many of you may or may not know me, but today is a very important day to me. It is the day I have reached three thousand plays on my soundcloud. That may be a small number for everyone else, but for me that's something I would have never believed possible back when I first started using Auxy as a music tool rather than a music toy. So, in celebration of my most liked track (as of 9:50 PM CST on 11/21/2017) I am hosting a remix contest for [Re/Fragmented](https://soundcloud.com/james-lucien-official/refragmented)
![refremix|500x500](upload://4ppFwUGPmttilfb8h4Yu8Krf2OC.jpg)
The Rules of the Remix Contest:
* Please title it as James Lucien - Re/Fragmented ([Your Name] [Optional Title] remix). Name required, optional title not required but appreciated because that's what I love. * Use the cover art provided above. If you want to add a title to it that's ok, just run it by me first if at all possible. * Don't destroy my baby please D: JK completely tear it apart if you want. Just make sure it resembles the original song or the stems at least. You can focus on any part of the song too, but make sure there's some part of it in there.
Have fun! The contest will close in three weeks from now on December 19, 2017 at 10 PM CST (-06:00 GMT).
| REMIX STEMS V [The stems for the project include the introduction, pre-verse, verse and chorus of the piece. Have fun!](https://app.auxy.co/projects/_FfD_u8K1LUICUtnDPRZ1g==) ^ | REMIX STEMS
And here is [the original song if you need to see it again](https://soundcloud.com/james-lucien-official/refragmented).

item.title: Re/Fragmented Remix Contest
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Contest ending early. All entries are in a short list. Will add the list here soon. Thank you to those who entered and did the contest, it really means the world to me.

https://soundcloud.com/james-lucien-official/sets/re-fragmented-re-mixes

Thanks everyone.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Less than one week remaining for the remix contest! For the other possibly 20 people who downloaded the stems but haven’t done their remix yet, it’s due this coming tuesday at 10 PM CST, which is 4 am on the 20th in GMT.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Re/Fragmented Remix Contest
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Just a quick update the remix contest is being extended out until December 19th, 2017 at 10 PM CST (-06:00 GMT) because I didn’t realize that final exams were happening that week! Yay xD So everyone who wanted to go ahead and get a remix done has more time to do so. Thanks for everyone currently participating, vocal and/or non-vocal for your support. You’ve made the last week and a half a lot more bearable for me to see your appreciation. ^w^

Read full topic

Thanks! I’m so happy both you and @anon35891271 participated ^w^ both are so good omg i’m crying inside in the best of ways

item.description:
Hello everyone. Many of you may or may not know me, but today is a very important day to me. It is the day I have reached three thousand plays on my soundcloud. That may be a small number for everyone else, but for me that’s something I would have never believed possible back when I first started using Auxy as a music tool rather than a music toy. So, in celebration of my most liked track (as of 9:50 PM CST on 11/21/2017) I am hosting a remix contest for Re/Fragmented

The Rules of the Remix Contest:

  • Please title it as James Lucien - Re/Fragmented ([Your Name] [Optional Title] remix). Name required, optional title not required but appreciated because that’s what I love.
  • Use the cover art provided above. If you want to add a title to it that’s ok, just run it by me first if at all possible.
  • Don’t destroy my baby please D: JK completely tear it apart if you want. Just make sure it resembles the original song or the stems at least. You can focus on any part of the song too, but make sure there’s some part of it in there.

Have fun! The contest will close in three weeks from now on December 19, 2017 at 10 PM CST (-06:00 GMT).

V
The stems for the project include the introduction, pre-verse, verse and chorus of the piece. Have fun!
